commands.name: az devops security permission namespace list
commands.summary: List all available namespaces for an organization.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission namespace list [--detect {false, true}]
                                             [--local-only]
                                             [--org]

commands.name: az devops security permission namespace show
commands.summary: Show details of permissions available in each namespace.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission namespace show --id
                                             [--detect {false, true}]
                                             [--org]
